text: Joint Base Andrews (JBA) is a United States military facility in Prince George's County, Maryland. The facility is under the United States Air Force (USAF) 316th Wing, Air Force District of Washington (AFDW).Officials unveil Joint Base Andrews The base was created in 2009, when Andrews Air Force Base and Naval Air Facility Washington were merged. ==References== Category:Military buildings and structures in the United States
title: Joint Base Andrews
